item.name: CITRIX: ICA Port Availability
item.description: Test the availability of Citrix ICA on TCP port 1494.

item.name: CITRIX: ASP.NET Request Execution Time
item.description: The amount of time (in milliseconds) that it took to execute the most recent request.

item.name: CITRIX: ASP.NET Requests Current
item.description: The current number of requests, both executing and queued.

item.name: CITRIX: ASP.NET Requests Queued
item.description: The number of requests waiting to be processed by ASP.

item.name: CITRIX: ASP.NET Requests Rejected
item.description: The number of requests rejected because the request queue was full.

item.name: CITRIX: IMA Networking Bytes Received/sec
item.key: perf_counter[\Citrix IMA Networking(_Total)\バイト受信/秒]
item.description: The inbound bytes per second.

item.name: CITRIX: IMA Networking Bytes Sent/sec
item.key: perf_counter[\Citrix IMA Networking(_Total)\バイト送信/秒]
item.description: The outbound bytes per second.

item.name: CITRIX: License Server Connection Failure
item.key: perf_counter[\Citrix Licensing\ライセンス サーバー接続エラー]
item.description: Displays the number of minutes that XenApp has been disconnected from the License Server.

item.name: CITRIX: Average License Check-Out Response Time (ms)
item.key: perf_counter[\Citrix Licensing\ライセンス チェックアウト平均応答時間 (ミリ秒)]
item.description: Displays the average license check - out response time in milliseconds. Please note that network congestion can influence the values reported.

item.name: CITRIX: Last Recorded License Check-Out Response Time (ms)
item.key: perf_counter[\Citrix Licensing\ライセンス チェックアウト最新応答時間 (ミリ秒)]
item.description: Displays the last recorded license check - out response time in milliseconds.

item.name: CITRIX: Application Enumerations/sec
item.key: perf_counter[\Citrix MetaFrame Presentation Server\アプリケーション一覧の取得/秒]
item.description: The number of non - XML-based enumerations (requests for application lists) per second.

item.name: CITRIX: Application Resolutions/sec
item.key: perf_counter[\Citrix MetaFrame Presentation Server\アプリケーション解決/秒]
item.description: The number of resolutions (applicable launch requests) per second.

item.name: CITRIX: Application Resolution Time (ms)
item.key: perf_counter[\Citrix MetaFrame Presentation Server\アプリケーション解決時間 (ミリ秒)]
item.description: The time in milliseconds that a resolution took to complete. This is also the time required to determine the least - loaded” server during an application launch.

item.name: CITRIX: Data Store Connection Failure
item.key: perf_counter[\Citrix MetaFrame Presentation Server\データ ストアへの接続エラー]
item.description: The number of minutes that the XenApp server has been disconnected from the data store.

item.name: CITRIX: Number of busy XML threads
item.key: perf_counter[\Citrix MetaFrame Presentation Server\ビジー XML スレッド数]
item.description: The number of XML threads currently being processed. There are 16 worker threads in the Citrix XML Service.

item.name: CITRIX: Filtered Application Enumerations/sec
item.key: perf_counter[\Citrix MetaFrame Presentation Server\フィルターされたアプリケーション一覧の取得/秒]
item.description: The number of XML-based enumerations (requests for application lists) per second.

item.name: CITRIX: WorkItem Queue Count
item.key: perf_counter[\Citrix MetaFrame Presentation Server\作業項目キュー待機数]
item.description: The number of work items that are ready to be executed.

item.name: CITRIX: Resolution WorkItem Queue Count
item.key: perf_counter[\Citrix MetaFrame Presentation Server\解決作業項目キュー待機数]
item.description: The number of resolution work items (related to application launches) that are ready to be executed.

item.name: CITRIX: Terminal Services Active Sessions
item.description: Number of active sessions.

item.name: CITRIX: Terminal Services Total Sessions
item.description: Total number of Terminal services sessions.

trigger.expression: {Template App Citrix XenApp:service_state[Citrix 64-bit Virtual Memory Optimization].last()}>0
trigger.name: CITRIX: Citrix 64-bit Virtual Memory Optimization is not running on {HOSTNAME}
CITRIX: Citrix Audio Redirection Service is not running on {HOSTNAME}
CITRIX: Citrix CPU Utilization Mgmt/CPU Rebalancer is not running on {HOSTNAME}
CITRIX: Citrix CPU Utilization Mgmt/Resource Mgmt is not running on {HOSTNAME}
CITRIX: Citrix Delivery Services Protocol Transition Service is not running on {HOSTNAME}
CITRIX: Citrix Diagnostic Facility COM Server is not running on {HOSTNAME}
CITRIX: Citrix Encryption Service is not running on {HOSTNAME}
CITRIX: Citrix End User Experiencing Monitoring is not running on {HOSTNAME}
CITRIX: Citrix Group Policy Engine is not running on {HOSTNAME}
CITRIX: Citrix HDX MediaStream for Flash Service is not running on {HOSTNAME}
CITRIX: Citrix Health Monitoring and Recovery is not running on {HOSTNAME}
CITRIX: Citrix Independent Management Architecture is not running on {HOSTNAME}
CITRIX: Citrix Location and Sensor Virtual Channel Service is not running on {HOSTNAME}
CITRIX: Citrix MFCOM Service is not running on {HOSTNAME}
CITRIX: Citrix Mobile Receiver Virtual Channel Service is not running on {HOSTNAME}
CITRIX: Citrix Print Manager Service is not running on {HOSTNAME}
CITRIX: Citrix Services ManagerCitrix Smart Card Service is not running on {HOSTNAME}
CITRIX: Citrix Streaming Helper Service is not running on {HOSTNAME}
CITRIX: Citrix Streaming Service is not running on {HOSTNAME}

trigger.expression: {Template App Citrix XenApp:service_state[Citrix Virtual Memory Optimization].last()}>0
trigger.name: CITRIX: Citrix Virtual Memory Optimization is not running on {HOSTNAME}
CITRIX: Citrix WMI Service is not running on {HOSTNAME}
CITRIX: Citrix XenApp Commands Remoting is not running on {HOSTNAME}
CITRIX: Citrix XTE Server is not running on {HOSTNAME}
CITRIX: ICA port 1494 is Down
CITRIX: Some requests are rejected.

trigger.expression: {Template App Citrix XenApp:perf_counter[\Citrix Licensing\ライセンス チェックアウト最新応答時間 (ミリ秒)].last(0)}>5000
trigger.name: CITRIX: The License Server response time is high.
trigger.description: A value of more than 5000 milliseconds indicates a performance issue at the license server.

trigger.expression: {Template App Citrix XenApp:perf_counter[\Citrix MetaFrame Presentation Server\解決作業項目キュー待機数].min(#2)}>0
trigger.name: CITRIX: The number of resolution work items is high.
trigger.description: A value above 0 indicates that requests are being queued while IMA handles other requests

trigger.expression: {Template App Citrix XenApp:perf_counter[\Citrix MetaFrame Presentation Server\作業項目キュー待機数].min(#3)}>0
trigger.name: CITRIX: The number of work items is high.
trigger.description: A value above 0 indicates that requests are being queued while IMA handles other requests. This counter should not be over 1 for an extended period of time.

trigger.expression: {Template App Citrix XenApp:perf_counter[\Citrix MetaFrame Presentation Server\ビジー XML スレッド数].min(#2)}>15
trigger.name: CITRIX: The XML threads count is high.
trigger.description: A count of 16 or more shows that XML requests are not being processed in a timely manner.

trigger.expression: {Template App Citrix XenApp:perf_counter[\Citrix MetaFrame Presentation Server\データ ストアへの接続エラー].last(0)}>0
trigger.name: CITRIX: XenApp server is disconnected from the data store.

trigger.expression: {Template App Citrix XenApp:perf_counter[\Citrix Licensing\ライセンス サーバー接続エラー].last(0)}>30
trigger.name: CITRIX: XenApp server is disconnected from the license server.
